title: The built up area of the EWS / LIG tenements constructed under the Scheme shall not be counted towards FSI and such built-up area of EWS / LIG tenements (20%) shall be over and above the permissible FSI / TDR as per UDCPR
clause_text: The built up area of the EWS / LIG tenements constructed under the Scheme shall not be counted towards FSI and such built-up area of EWS / LIG tenements (20%) shall be over and above the permissible FSI / TDR as per UDCPR.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
